name: macron
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a symbol (ˉ) written or printed above a vowel to show that it is pronounced with a long sound: "Maori" should be written with a macron on the "a". The five vowels come in long and short forms; the long form is sometimes signified in print by a macron (a flat bar) above the letter. Compare
breve (PRONUNCIATION) specialized
More examplesFewer examplesMacrons have been omitted in well-known place names such as Tokyo and Kyoto. The user must contend with macrons over some vowels.Long vowels are indicated by placing a line or bar above the vowel. This is a diacritical mark known as a macron.
